awd_titl_txt: Doctoral Dissertation Research in Decision, Risk and        Management Science
awd_abstract_narration: This doctoral dissertation research examines organizational culture             from the property rights perspective and aims to develop and                    empirically test a framework that predicts the relationship between             contextual constraints and the emergent control systems in the                  organization on the one hand, and the influence of these                        constraints and controls on group norms within the organization,                on the other.  The scope of this study is limited to the                        verification of                                                                 (a) the relationship between contextual constraints and property                    rights at the individual level,                                             (b) the relationship between constraints, rights and ``within                       group'' norms.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Social, Behavioral and Economic Sciences
org_div_long_name: Division of Social and Economic Sciences
